This repository contains the reproducible code for figures and tables of the manuscript **Open Soil Spectral Library (OSSL): Building reproducible soil calibration models through open development and community engagement**.

The initial submission was archived as a preprint in bioRxiv:

> Safanelli, J. L., Hengl, T., Parente, L., Minarik, R., Bloom, D. E., Todd-Brown, K., Gholizadeh, A., Mendes, W. de S., & Sanderman, J. (2023). Open Soil Spectral Library (OSSL): Building reproducible soil calibration models through open development and community engagement. bioRxiv preprint. [DOI:10.1101/2023.12.16.572011](https://doi.org/10.1101/2023.12.16.572011).

It is currently under review. Once published we will provide further information and a copy to this repository.
